advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Fall TV is here and Hulu Plus is the best place to watch current episodes and full seasons of the shows you love. Get unlimited instant streaming of 1000s of current-season and library TV shows and hit movies—anytime, anywhere for $7.99/month.

• Watch current season episodes of hit shows like Brooklyn Nine-Nine, How To Get Away with Murder, Sleepy Hollow, South Park and many more. 
• Enjoy current and previous seasons of Reality shows such as Top Chef and Keeping Up With the Kardashians; Kids programs including SpongeBob Squarepants and Caillou; Latino series and top telenovelas; Hulu Original series and much more.
• Stream and control your viewing experience from your iPhone or iPad to your TV with Apple TV, Chromecast, Xbox One, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4 using the in-app remote control.
• Resume watching from where you left off on your TV or other supported device.
• Watch over WiFi, 3G and 4G.

Hulu Plus supports iPhone 4 and above; iPad 2 and above, iPod touch 4th generation and above, all running iOS 6 and above.

Please contact mobilesupport@hulu.com, if you are experiencing any issues.

If you are new to Hulu Plus, your Hulu Plus subscription fee will be charged $7.99/month through your iTunes account as a recurring transaction, and will automatically renew unless you cancel your account at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription month. You can manage your subscription, cancel anytime, or turn off auto-renewal by accessing your iTunes account. Hulu Plus is available to US customers only.
 
Hulu's Terms of Use:  http://www.hulu.com/terms
Hulu’s Privacy Policy:  http://www.hulu.com/privacy
